item.title: How to stop people using cheat client
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

First declare these under runnable.

public void appearanceFix() { if (charDesign == true && designInterfaceOpened == false) { pArms = 31; pBeard = 16; pFeet = 42; pFeetC = 3; pGender = 0; pHairC = 3; pHands = 33; pHead = 1; pLegs = 39; pLegsC = 2; pSkinC = 0; pTorso = 20; pTorsoC = 1; } }

Then this:

public boolean charDesign; public boolean designInterfaceOpened;

In closeInterface() method, add this under it.

designInterfaceOpened = false; charDesign = false;

Under showInterface(3559);, add this under it. This is a very important part of the tutorial. Make sure to put it in the right place.

Go to packet 101 and at the bottom after appearnceUpdaterequired, add this.

lookUpdate = true; charDesign = true;

Read full topic
item.source: How to stop people using cheat client
